Name.BusinessNameLine1: BOYS & GIRLS CLUBS OF CLEVELAND INC

IRS990.Description: AFTER SCHOOL AND SUMMER PROGRAMS THAT USE 5 CORE AREAS TO HELP MEMBERS REACH FULL POTENTIAL AS PRODUCTIVE, RESPONSIBLE AND CARING CITIZENS.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 2, PART V, LINE 4
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: THE ENDOWMENT FUNDS CONSIST OF TWO SEPARATE FUNDS: EDUCATION AND ENDOWMENT. THE PURPOSE OF THE EDUCATION FUND EARNINGS IS FOR COLLEGE SCHOLARSHIPS FOR MEMBERS OF THE CLUB. THE PURPOSE OF THE ENDOWMENT FUND IS FOR CAPITAL EXPANSION/MAINTENANCE OF CLUB PROPERTY.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: EXPLANATION ON VOLUNTEERS AND TYPES OF SERVICES OR BENEFITS
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: INDIVIDUALS VOLUNTEER THEIR TIME AND PERFORM A VARIETY OF TASKS RELATING TO ALL ACTIVITIES OF THE BOYS & GIRLS CLUBS OF CLEVELAND, INC. THESE SERVICES DO NOT REQUIRE SPECIFIC EXPERTISE FROM THE VOLUNTEER. SERVICES INCLUDE TUTORING, GOVERNING BOARD, MAINTENANCE WORK, MENTORING, AND RECREATION ASSISTANCE.

CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY - ALTHOUGH A FORMAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY DOES NOT EXIST, EMPLOYEES AND BOARD MEMBERS ARE EXPECTED TO REPORT ANY CONFLICTS OF INTEREST THAT MAY ARISE. CONFLICTS OF INTEREST WITH EMPLOYEES ARE REVEIWED BY THE HUMAN RESOURCES COMMITTEE AND THE HUMAN RESOURCES COMMITTEE DETERMINES IF THERE ARE ANY PROBLEMS CREATED BY THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST. COMMITTEE MEETS WITH EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND EMPLOYEE TO ADDRESS CONCERNS AND ISSUES. WHISTLEBLOWER POLICY - STAFF ARE ENCOURAGED TO REPORT ANY CONCERNS TO EITHER SUPERVISORS OR THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS. DOCUMENT RETENTION AND DESTRUCTION POLICY - WHILE A WRITTEN RETENTION POLICY IS NOT APPROVED, A SUGGESTED RETENTION GUIDE FOR BUSINESS RECORDS IS ON HAND AND USED A REFERENCE FOR RETENTION AND DESTRUCTION OF RECORDS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: ORGANIZATION'S PROCESS USED TO REVIEW FORM 990
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: FORM 990 IS REVIEWED AND FILED BY MANAGEMENT. THE ENTIRE AUDIT PACKAGE, INCLUDING FORM 990, IS PRESENTED TO THE BOARD FOR APPROVAL.
COMPENSATION IS BASED ON BOYS & GIRLS CLUBS OF AMERICA SALARY COMPARISON AND APPROVED BY BOARD OF DIRECTORS.
COMPENSATION IS BASED ON BOYS & GIRLS CLUBS OF AMERICA SALARY COMPARISONS AND APPROVED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.
DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
